subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following cities served as the capital of Rajasthan in the past?
question_hi: राजस्थान के पूर्वोत्तर में किस शहर का चयन किया गया था?
explanation_en: Jodhpur served as the capital of Rajasthan in the past. The capital of Rajasthan was moved to Jaipur in 1949.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान के पूर्वोत्तर में जोधपुर का चयन किया गया था। 1949 में राजस्थान के प्रांत में जोधपुर के बदल किया गया था।
B_en: Jodhpur served as the capital of Rajasthan in the past.
B_hi: जोधपुर राजस्थान के पूर्वोत्तर, जोधपुर का चयन किया गया था।
C_en: Pushkar served as the capital of Rajasthan in the past.
C_hi: पुष्कर राजस्थान के पूर्वोत्तर, जोधपुर का चयन किया गया था।
D_en: Jaipur served as the capital of Rajasthan in the past.
D_hi: राजस्थान के प्रांत, जोधपुर का चयन किया गया था।
E_en: Udaipur was the capital of Rajasthan in the past.
E_hi: उद्यापुर राजस्थान के प्रांत, जोधपुर का चयन किया गया था।
F_en: Airawat was the capital of Rajasthan in the past.
F_hi: एडेरावत, जोधपुर का चयन किया गया था।
question_en: Which city served as the capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur?
question_hi: जोधपुर के प्रांत कौने शीर्षिका था?

options.option_explain_en: Before Jaipur became the capital of Rajasthan, Airawat served as its capital.
options.option_explain_hi: जोधपुर के प्रांत कौने शीर्षिका था।

options.option_explain_en: Airawat was the capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur became the capital. Jaisamand served as its capital before Airawat.
options.option_explain_hi: जोधपुर के प्रांत कौने शीर्षिका था।

options.option_explain_en: Airawat was the capital of Rajasthan until Jaipur became the capital. Udaipur was the capital before Airawat.
options.option_explain_hi: जोधपुर के प्रांत कौने शीर्षिका था।

options.option_explain_en: Jaisamand was the capital of Rajasthan until Jaipur became the capital. Udaipur was the capital before Jaipur.
